website_summaries.verdict: A responsive Android-based 2-in-1 netbook that hits all the basic buttons yet comes in at a rock-bottom retail price.
pros: Handles lighter multitasking well, and interfaces seamlessly with online Google applications
Android Lollipop operating system runs smoothly
Tolerates drops and regular wear and tear
cons: System can lag after being idle for several minutes
Input from keyboard can be frustratingly slow
Heavier than expected for a tablet-keyboard combo
